resources.string:
Daily Calorie Needs Calculator is a helpful tool designed to assist users in determining their bodys daily energy requirements based on weight, height, age, gender, and physical activity level. 

With an attractive and interactive interface, this application helps users manage a healthier and more balanced diet, supporting the achievement of an active and ideal lifestyle. 

This application was developed as part of the Assessment 1 for Mobile Programming 1.
